cleaner package¶

Submodules¶

cleaner.filers module¶

synopsis:This module contains the lower level API that handles the storing to the filesystem
class cleaner.filers.ArticleFilerBase[source]¶

Bases: object

Base API to store an article according to regex members

Members:
getFileName(title)[source]¶

Processes filename for article to be stored

Parameters:title – Article title to be incorporated in filename.
write(article)[source]¶
class cleaner.filers.BatchFiler(schema)[source]¶

Bases: object

API to retrieve data from a given download batch

write(filename)[source]¶

Writes a downloaded batch file to the cleaned folder given schema’s article filer

Parameters:filename – Filename of batch to read from.
class cleaner.filers.FilerResult(added=None, article=None, fileName=None, filePath=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Result of an attempted article filing

Prints as: * file and filepath if successful * the article if failed to store :members:

cleaner.store module¶

Created on Feb 7, 2014
